Package adrenaline.client

Class RMIClientCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • adrenaline.client.RMIClientCommands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientAPI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class RMIClientCommands
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ClientAPI
    RMIClientCommands implements ClientAPI,for implement the command from server, set the game flow value for client via RMI
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
